sentence: Meeting in their first primary debate, ex-Cincinnati Mayor John Cranley and former Dayton Mayor Nan Whaley blamed DeWine for enabling the $60 million statehouse bribery scheme, failing to pass meaningful gun reforms and flip-flopping on mask mandates.
author: JOHN SEEWER
title: Democrats in governor debate blame DeWine for Ohio's woes

sentence: The winner of the Republican primary will face the Democratic nominee, either former Cincinnati Mayor John Cranley or ex-Dayton Mayor Nan Whaley.
author: Associated Press
title: DeWine Aims to Overcome Anger in GOP Base
